title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Online and In-person Instructional Preferences

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Environment requiring time management and self-directed learning competencies for working professionals. Blended learning environment implemented using personal devices via BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can explain ten key factors to consider when choosing between online and in-person classes.
Learners apply time management strategies in blended learning environments within a simulated setting.
Learners can analyze VR-based cases to select optimal instructional methods tailored to personal contexts.
Learners can compare and analyze preferences across diverse learner types through peer assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
